channel.title: Need help with slayer tasks [Delta]
channel.description: Is there a command that can give you a slayer task with a command like ::gettask for delta cuz my client has vannaka but my webclient doesnt. (im using webclient from rs-ps)

item.title: Need help with slayer tasks [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @sk1llmunky sk1llmunky
item.description:
@sk1llmunky wrote:

ty so much dude

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with slayer tasks [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

this is the method in client.java

	public void giveTask() 
	{
		if (combatLevel >= 3 && combatLevel <= 50) {
			taskID = randomLowTask();
			taskAmount = 10 + misc.random(40);
			talk2("Your task is to kill "+taskAmount+" "+GetNpcName(taskID)+"s.", "", 1597);
		}
		if (combatLevel >= 51 && combatLevel <= 100) {
			taskID = randomMediumTask();
			taskAmount = 10 + misc.random(40);
			talk2("Your task is to kill "+taskAmount+" "+GetNpcName(taskID)+"s.", "", 1597);
		}
		if (combatLevel >= 101) {
			taskID = randomHighTask();
			taskAmount = 10 + misc.random(40);
			talk2("Your task is to kill "+taskAmount+" "+GetNpcName(taskID)+"s.", "", 1597);
		}
	}

1597 = vannaka

just change to an NPC that you do have in the webclient - that would be easiest fix

however, I think it could be converted to a command like this:

	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("gettask")) 
	{
		if (combatLevel >= 3 && combatLevel <= 50) {
			taskID = randomLowTask();
			taskAmount = 10 + misc.random(40);
			sM("Your task is to kill "+taskAmount+" "+GetNpcName(taskID)+"s.");
		}
		if (combatLevel >= 51 && combatLevel <= 100) {
			taskID = randomMediumTask();
			taskAmount = 10 + misc.random(40);
			sM("Your task is to kill "+taskAmount+" "+GetNpcName(taskID)+"s.");
		}
		if (combatLevel >= 101) {
			taskID = randomHighTask();
			taskAmount = 10 + misc.random(40);
			sM("Your task is to kill "+taskAmount+" "+GetNpcName(taskID)+"s.");
		}
	}

idk might workâ€¦

Read full topic
